Requirement Description: Understanding the organization - Internal and external issues documented
Interested parties - Identify stakeholders and their requirements
QMS Scope - Define scope statement and exclusions
Process approach - Create process flow diagram
Leadership commitment - Management demonstrates commitment
Quality policy - Written and communicated quality policy
Communicate policy - Policy posted and discussed with employees
Roles and responsibilities - Document who is responsible for what
Risks and opportunities - Risk register with 5-10 identified risks
Plan actions - Mitigation plans documented for each risk
Quality objectives - Measurable quality goals established
Change management - Process for handling major changes
Resources - Adequate staff and equipment confirmed
People - Employees are competent with right skills
Infrastructure - Buildings and equipment maintained
Monitoring resources - Measuring equipment calibrated with records
Competence - Training documented for each employee
Documented information - Document control system implemented
Operational planning - Production planning process documented
Customer communication - Customer contact methods documented
Review of requirements - Order review process before acceptance
Design (if applicable) - Design process documented
Externally provided - Supplier control system in place
Production control - Work instructions and process parameters documented
Identification - Products tagged/labeled through production
Customer property - Customer materials/tooling protected
Release of products - Inspection/testing process before shipment
Nonconforming outputs - Defect disposition process documented
Monitoring - Quality metrics tracked (defects/delivery/complaints)
Customer satisfaction - Customer satisfaction measured
Internal audit - Annual internal audit conducted and documented
Management review - Annual management review meeting held
Continual improvement - Improvement activities documented
Nonconformity - Defects documented when they occur
Root cause - Root cause analysis conducted for defects
Corrective action - Root causes fixed permanently
